gmcm.enabled.name: Enable Sebastian Form by default
gmcm.enabled.tooltip: If enabled, you will appear as Sebastian when the form is active. The hotkey toggles this at runtime.
gmcm.toggleKey.name: Toggle Sebastian Form
gmcm.toggleKey.tooltip: Press to turn Sebastian Form on or off.
gmcm.hideInMenus.name: Hide overlay in menus
gmcm.hideInMenus.tooltip: If enabled, the farmer is not replaced while any menu is open.
gmcm.drawAboveFarmer.name: Draw above farmer
gmcm.drawAboveFarmer.tooltip: Draw the Sebastian sprite over the farmer instead of underneath.
gmcm.localOnly.name: Local player only
gmcm.localOnly.tooltip: If true, only your own farmer is overlaid. Disable to render all farmers locally (clients must run the mod to see themselves).
gmcm.opacity.name: Overlay opacity
gmcm.opacity.tooltip: Percent opacity for the Sebastian overlay (100 = fully opaque).
gmcm.offsetX.name: Horizontal offset
gmcm.offsetX.tooltip: Adjust left/right offset to align Sebastian's feet with the farmer.
gmcm.offsetY.name: Vertical offset
gmcm.offsetY.tooltip: Adjust up/down offset to align Sebastian's feet with the farmer.
gmcm.debug.name: Debug logging
gmcm.debug.tooltip: If enabled, logs when the overlay is skipped due to unsafe states.
